entry.title: Android类原生跳Google开机验证
entry.content:
一时原生一时香，一直原生一直香，给大家丢一个跳谷歌开机验证的东西
请在刷过相关原生ROM之后刷入此包即可，不需要双清系统本包意在修正相关参数，跳过谷歌开机验证，以前的一些方法已经失效，不妨尝试下公布部分代码文件：

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' standalone='yes' ?><settings version="169"><setting id="23" name="lock_screen_show_notifications" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="32" name="unknown_sources_default_reversed" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="116" name="tst_support" value="0" package="com.android.updater" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="96" name="com_miui_applicationlock_fingerprint_upgrade" value="1" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="20" name="immersive_mode_confirmations" value="" package="android" defaultValue="" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="109" name="default_input_method" value="com.sohu.inputmethod.sogou.xiaomi/.SogouIME" package="android" defaultValue="com.sohu.inputmethod.sogou.xiaomi/.SogouIME" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="68" name="face_unlock_has_feature" value="0" package="com.miui.face" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="25" name="sleep_timeout" value="-1" package="android" defaultValue="-1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="114" name="auto_download" value="1" package="com.android.updater" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="71" name="sell_num_state" value="1" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="118" name="location_providers_allowed" value="gps,network" package="com.miui.yellowpage" defaultValue="" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="24" name="lock_screen_allow_private_notifications" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="112" name="settings_fingerprint_id_prefix_-1640284947" value="Fingerprint1" package="com.android.settings" defaultValue="Fingerprint1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="27" name="double_tap_to_wake" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="10" name="speak_password" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="89" name="SILENT_MODE_FOR_MIUI9" value="3" package="com.android.settings" defaultValue="3" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="115" name="preview_plan" value="0" package="com.android.updater" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="22" name="wake_gesture_enabled" value="0" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="127" name="screen_buttons_state" value="0" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="120" name="key_homelist_cache_deleted" value="1" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="14" name="screensaver_activate_on_sleep" value="0" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="35" name="volume_hush_gesture" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="113" name="auto_update" value="0" package="com.android.updater" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="84" name="privacy_password_status" value="0" package="com.android.settings" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="67" name="backup_enabled" package="android" /><setting id="73" name="fraud_num_state_sim_2" value="1" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="78" name="gb_handsfree" value="0" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="19" name="user_setup_complete" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="128" name="screen_project_hang_up_on" value="0" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="60" name="enabled_widgets" value="" package="android" defaultValue="" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="37" name="manual_ringer_toggle_count" value="0" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="70" name="agent_num_state" value="1" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="82" name="enabled_accessibility_services" value="" package="com.lbe.security.miui" defaultValue="" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="53" name="trust_agents_initialized" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="93" name="gamebooster_data_migration" value="1" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="11" name="lockscreen.disabled" value="0" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="40" name="enabled_notification_assistant" value="com.google.android.ext.services/android.ext.services.notification.Assistant" package="android" defaultValue="com.google.android.ext.services/android.ext.services.notification.Assistant" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="44" name="fw_fsgesture_support_superpower" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="43" name="lock_screen_owner_info_enabled" value="0" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="64" name="voice_assist_completed" value="0" package="com.miui.voicetrigger" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="55" name="selected_spell_checker_subtype" value="0" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="97" name="clear_smarttravel_permission_flag" value="1" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="91" name="key_is_in_miui_sos_mode" value="0" package="com.android.settings" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="8" name="long_press_timeout" value="400" package="android" defaultValue="400" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="122" name="screen_project_small_window_on" value="0" package="com.milink.service" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="52" name="sysui_tuner_version" value="1" package="com.android.systemui" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="79" name="gb_boosting" value="0" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="62" name="xspace_enabled" value="0" package="android" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="80" name="disable_voicetrigger" value="0" package="com.miui.securitycenter" defaultValue="0" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="34" name="notification_badging" value="1" package="android" defaultValue="1" defaultSysSet="true" /><setting id="15" name="screensaver_components" value="com.google.android.deskclock/com.android.deskclock.Screensaver" package="android" defaultValue="com.google.android.deskclock/com.android.deskclock.Screensaver" defaultSysSet="true" />

下载地址：Android跳Google开机验证

entry.title: Hexo博客安装
entry.content:
话不多说先上Hexo官网：https://hexo.io/zh-cn/
1：准备环境

1.安装git Git官网: https://git-scm.com/download/
2.安装Node.js node.js 官网：https://nodejs.org/en/

2：安装 Hexo

在任意位置单击右键，选择“Git Bash Here”即可。

所有必备的应用程序安装完成后，即可使用 npm 安装 Hexo。

npm install -g hexo-cli

下载完成以后

3:建站

在任意目录下创建一个博客安装地址，这个就是你博客存放的地方，然后在你创建的文件夹内，置单击右键，选择“Git Bash Here”然后执行以下命令

hexo init HexoBlog

然后执行

cd HexoBlog

进行安装

npm install


生成目录结构哦如图所示

本地运行三部曲

hexo cleanhexo ghexo s


浏览器打开http://localhost:4000/即可访问
